attributes.action: introduce annual fully independent, audited performance reviews for all government departments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Annual performance reviews, carried out by independent experts, into the performance of all government agencies and departments would do much to restore public confidence in central government. It is time to replace ad hoc parliamentary select committee investigations and NAO audits with regular, ongoing, performance reviews, to be published in full and independent of ministerial control or editing.
